description.ruby-sapphire:
Allows a full-power attack,
but sharply lowers SP. ATK.
description.emerald:
Allows a full-power attack,
but sharply lowers SP. ATK.
description.firered-leafgreen:
An intense attack
that also sharply
reduces the user’s
SP. ATK stat.

The attack’s recoil
sharply reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
